Air Traffic Story Telling During the Pandemic

This project is aimed to show how pandemic affects world aviation. Particularly, we focus on the number of flights over the pandemic

More

Break of the pandemic

In Jan 2020, WHO declared the Covid-19 outbreak a Public Health Emergency of International Concern.

Next

Hard time for airlines

U.S. passenger airlines incurred pre-tax losses of $46B in 2020.

Next
Next

Case Study

There are many travel restrictions against the pandemic between some countries that may have great impacts on flights. We choose China and the U.S. to illustrate this phenomena since the travel restrictions between these two countries changes a lot
